h2_title: Where to Find the Centipede Guai
content: The Centipede Guai is an main boss and non-missable encounter that you'll find exploring the massive Webbed Hollow Portion of Chapter 4. After descending down to the Vedure Bridge Shrine, you'll find two paths divering when you head right to find a group of buildings in the underground hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Centipede Guai'.
The content is as follows:
The Centipede Guai is an main boss and non-missable encounter that you'll find exploring the massive Webbed Hollow Portion of Chapter 4. After descending down to the Vedure Bridge Shrine, you'll find two paths divering when you head right to find a group of buildings in the underground hollow.
